    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4

    Facet PersonName_Summary

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:PersonName_Summary

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<PersonName xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4">
    <Prefix>Mr.</Prefix>
    <Given>John</Given>
    <Middle>Example String Value</Middle>
    <Surname>Smith</Surname>
</PersonName>

      Example JSON

      {
  "PersonNameSummary" : {
    "Prefix" : [ "Mr." ],
    "Given" : [ "John" ],
    "Middle" : [ "Example String Value" ],
    "Surname" : "Smith"
  }
}

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        Prefix
        Salutation of honorific (e.g. Mr., Mrs., Ms., Miss, Dr.)
        Details
        Type StringTiny
        Example Value Mr.
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 3
        Given
        Given name, first name or names.
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value John
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 5
        Middle
        The middle name of the person name.
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 5
        Surname
        Family name, last name. Note: Simple form of person name should be used for the full name. May also be used for full name if the sending system does not have the ability to separate a full name into its parts, e.g. the surname element may be used to pass the full name.
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value Smith
        Required true
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Alias Summary

        Aliases 
        RelatedTraveler_Simple_Person_Name_Summary
